data_description.device_type: The device type to add to Home Assistant.
data_description.connection_type: How Home Assistant can connect to the device.
data_description.host: The hostname or IP address of your Sungrow device to connect to.
data_description.tcp_port: The TCP port of the Shelly device to connect to.
data_description.serial_port: The serial port of your Sungrow device to connect to.
data_description.baudrate: The baudrate of your Sungrow device.
data_description.method: The method of the connection to modbus.
data_description.bytesize: The data size in bits of each byte.
data_description.parity: The parity of the data bytes
data_description.modbus_address: The Modbus device address of the Sungrow device.
